mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_LIST ( GROUP_NAME, GROUP_LEADER_SEQ, GROUP_PASSWORD ) VALUES ( #{groupName}, #{groupLeaderSeq}, #{groupPassword} )
INSERT INTO PROFILE_IMAGE ( GROUP_ID, PROFILE_IMAGE_NAME, PROFILE_IMAGE_SIZE, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{profileImageName}, #{profileImageSize}, #{profileImageUrl}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT PROFILE_IMAGE_ID as profileImageId, GROUP_ID as groupId, PROFILE_IMAGE_NAME as profileImageName, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as profileImageUrl FROM PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId} ORDER BY PROFILE_IMAGE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT GROUP_ID FROM GROUP_LIST WHERE GROUP_LEADER_SEQ = #{userSeq} ORDER BY GROUP_ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT USER_SEQ as userSeq, GROUP_LIST.GROUP_ID as groupId, GROUP_NAME as groupName, GROUP_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as groupProfileImageUrl, GROUP_LIST.GROUP_LEADER_SEQ as groupLeaderSeq FROM GROUP_LIST JOIN GROUP_MEMBER ON GROUP_LIST.GROUP_ID = GROUP_MEMBER.GROUP_ID WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_MEMBER ( GROUP_ID, USER_SEQ, MANAGER_YN ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{userSeq}, #{managerYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER.USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER.USER_ID as userId, USER.USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER.USER_NAME as userName, USER.USER_NICKNAME as userNickname, USER.USER_PHONE as userPhone, USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as userProfileImageUrl, GROUP_MEMBER.MANAGER_YN as managerYn FROM GROUP_MEMBER JOIN USER ON GROUP_MEMBER.USER_SEQ = USER.USER_SEQ WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
